channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Badley guarded, barriers knocked over by cars, trip hazard with entry to property, 9th August
item.description:
This has been dug up over 2 weeks ago and left like that, no one has been out to diagnose problems with tree or sort problem. Pedestrians struggling to cross road due to bad road works guarding I'm constantly going out aged 63 picking up barriers and putting them back together

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ash Grove, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins on pavement, 9th August
item.description:
Bins are still on the pavement 2 days after collection and causing issues with access for disabled pedestrians. These bins have been here for 2+ years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birling Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Water foundation broken by playground, 9th August
item.description:
Water foundation is broken by playground It’s in constant use and is needed especially in summer. Can it please be fixed. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gomm Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken bollards, base is a severe trip hazard, 9th August
item.description:
There are broken bollards around the bike racking in front of the Handel Museum and the black base is a trip hazard, blending into the road. There are reports on here from 2021 and 2022 about them breaking and it hasn’t been fixed. My mum has tripped on one and caused severe facial damage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Brook Street, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet
